pages.text: Performing a ritual requires an Emortic Vessel and an Offering. Once you have obtained a Vessel and the required Offering, place your Vessel in the world and use an offering on it.

To activate your ritual, interact with the Vessel with an empty hand. If a ritual requires Dominion to operate, the Vessel will pull from Dominion Jars within 6 blocks. Information related to rituals and their requirements can be found in their respective entries.
